website_summaries.verdict: Glucerna meal replacement shakes are primarily designed to meet the needs of diabetics, but regular dieters will also benefit.
pros: Uses a milk protein base, not soy isolate
cons: May need to be blended with ice to reduce richness
Some report feeling hungry after 2 hrs
Packaging can be challenging to open

customer_reviews.title: 16 Carbs Per Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: The front of the bottle says 1 Carb. But when you read the fine print on the back it actually has 16 carbs! I feel like I was duped! :(
customer_reviews.author: KC Moog

customer_reviews.title: Pican is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I truly don't know if it helps with my sugar levels, but I use it when I know I'm going to be miss a meal. What I best like about this product is the pecan flavor. Unfortunately it's hard to find. I usually like chocolate or vanilla and strawberry is my favorite ice cream. But I gag with all the nutritional drinks out there, except pican. Although the warehouse stores sell it cheaper, pecan is not available. So, I truly appreciate Amazon carrying it, but I wish it wasn't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SombradeRosa

customer_reviews.title: Lid too hard to open
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mother since she is unable to eat much recently. This is what we normally give to hospitalized patients as a substitute for a meal if they don’t have much appetite. You can put it in a freezer for an hour and it becomes a slushee. The only difficult thing is elderly patients or people with peripheral neuropathy would find it difficult to open it. Otherwise, this is a temporary good substitute for a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Quantumleap2007

customer_reviews.title: Just delicious
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this for my diabetes nutrition. I got Vanilla flavor too but I love strawberry lot more. Very rich and smooth. Just delicious. When people drink these type of shakes, it doesn't taste as good as normal drinks but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: J Park

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying and makes you feel like you ate a small meal.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good and satisfies my huge sweet tooth. It tastes sweet and satisfies yet helped lower my weight and my A1C along with a lowered sugar diet. This is how I got my sweet fix. It feels like I ate a small meal.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My sister told me about this product because she's diabetic, too, and said it helped regulate her blood sugars. So I bought it and immediately noticed a change in my blood glucose readings. I drink mine in the evening because I've always struggled to regulate my overnight blood sugars and it's made a large difference in my morning glucose levels.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Gllucerna but 1 size too small
customer_reviews.text: I love Glucerna, and it is a lifesaver at times. But I wish I'd been able to find the larger size. The milssing fifth star really is not about the drink, just because I wanted the larger size and could not find it. the smaller amount makes it for me just a tad less satilsfying -- but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: I also love the strawberry flavor
customer_reviews.text: One bottle of Glucerna takes the place of a whole meal! As a diebetic II patient on a controlled diet I substitute one meal a day with Glucerna. I also love the strawberry flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Willie M. McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting,  not always easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Taste great but does nothing to asuage any hunger, may or may not tide you over to next meal. For me sometimes hard to open to pull that tiny tab and always need an opening aid, really tight tops. I have to open these before hand so I can get it as soon as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I love Glucerna, great for a base for a smoothie oh, but too pricey for me!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use as a base for fruit smoothies. I am a diabetic. The vanilla works great to mix with fresh fruit and I even added a little coconut. They did turn out great, but too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Terre Christian

customer_reviews.title: Really works to assist in maintaining healthy blood sugars!!!
customer_reviews.text: My diabetic husband has been able to maintain healthy blood sugars with the help of this product!!! His Dr recently took him off his insulin! Healthy diet changes helped also.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Rich chocolate taste.  Great vanilla taste.
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Glucerna. It has a rich chocolate taste and helps with hunger between meals without spiking my blood sugar. Vanilla flavor tastes like a vanilla milkshake
customer_reviews.author: Meg McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and keeps my hunger down between  meals.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smooth natural chocolate flavor of this Glucerna. Will check my blood sugar readings for a while It should help me keep a close watch on my carbs and help my hunger pangs between meals.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Lank

customer_reviews.title: Not really lactose free.
customer_reviews.text: While the label states that it's suitable for Lactose Intolerance, it really isn't. Under Ingredients it says it contains milk or milk ingredients. Since this beverage gives me the same reaction I have when I eat/drink dairies, I have to conclude that it does indeed have milk in it, and saying that it's suitable for Lactose Intolerance is essentially wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Delicious>Diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I drink these 3 times a day. All flavors are delicious. But they give me a bit of diarrhea. So I mix the with coffee and drink half at, for example, 8AM and the rest at 10AM. Works good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Quick Acting...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad because he has a bad habit of cramming his mouth with so much bad foods when his sugar drops then his sugar is too high afterwards. When they were delivered, his sugar was low so he tried one to see if it really worked. He said within minutes he began to feel better. He said before it would take a long time to feel better after eating so much bad food. He also really liked the strawberry flavor. He's now a fanboy of this drink!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: flavor of drink, and low sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't wild about the vanilla, but a friend told me to put it in the freezer for 20 min. The flavor of the vanilla was so much better! Know it sounds strange, but try it, you may like it much better! Chocolate better too, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good option for snack in between meals. Also good for more easily digestible option if food consumption is difficult. Smooth texture. Great flavors, as well.
customer_reviews.author: RareForm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law used to drink Ensure but she likes this product better because of the low sugar content. She likes the strawberry flavor. She drinks one a day.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: delicious tasting meal substitute.
customer_reviews.text: I love these as a meal substitute , especially the chocolate , taste much better than other brands I've tried. Love having it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd G. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Butter Pecan Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I don't have diabetes, but I do have a tendency to gain weight. Glucerna tastes great, and is sugar free. I like it better than "low carb" diet, liquid meals.
customer_reviews.author: Marian A. Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Flavor Is The Best
customer_reviews.text: I like the vanilla flavor of boost but when I was told Glucerna was what I didn't for diabetes I turned to butter pecan. I will not even try Vanilla because I love butter pecan. I drink it at bedtime to avoid fast levels overnight that are high.
customer_reviews.author: Qui pro domina justitia sequitur

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I tried Vanilla, Strawberry and the classic butter pecan flavors and all of them are delicious. It really helped me to replace a meal per day, in my case the dinner. It makes me feel full, it doesn't affect my stomach and when I check my sugar after few hours of drinking the shake my sugar is at the perfect/normal levels. I really recommend this shakes, they do not have artificial sugar so doesn't have the taste of artificial sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Sastified customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Seller & Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This Drink was suggested by our Dr. & it is good flavoured! We got Strawberry Shake! Seller was accurate & delivered on time! We will use this Seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Mystic Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Really like the butter pecan-many other offers just do choc, vanilla & strawberry, none of which I like. Like the quantity so I don't have to order as often & the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves this flavor!
customer_reviews.text: My 87 year old mom lives 85 miles from me but needs my help to obtain food and products like this. I have found that we can have the grocery store deliver her food and Amazon deliver products like this. We put it on a Subscription delivery and it works like a charm! A case arrives just when she needs it. She thinks it is magic that we know when she is running out. Another great thing is that the Butter Pecan is more palatable than the vanilla or strawberry that we have gotten in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Manning

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the hardest product on the market to open Way to hard to open the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lynch

customer_reviews.title: this is good it keeps me full no spike on blood surgur
customer_reviews.text: this is good i have al ready started drinking these these are a good choice to have if you don't want to cook any food.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste.
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic i drink one at lunchtime it take the hunger away. Stabilize my blood sugar level. No after taste. My first choice for flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Dw

customer_reviews.title: Trying it again
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is so good but did not work last time.
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: Creamy Strawberry is the Best
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried all the flavors and most of them are gross except for the strawberry. The Creamy Strawberry flavored glucerna actually taste like a milkshake, and is the only one my family will drink now. It’s a bit pricey but we have it on monthly subscribe and save, so that helps a little.
customer_reviews.author: AdastraTraveler

customer_reviews.title: GLUCERNA GETS 2 THUMBS UP
customer_reviews.text: It's a a versatile food item! You can use it many ways and can change the flavor by adding a couple drops of SUGAR FREE syrup by DAVINCI or even STARBUCKS. I THINK THE VANILLA and BUTTER PECAN are GLUCERNAS BEST FLAVORS! I love GLUCERNA
customer_reviews.author: Yvette E.

customer_reviews.title: Shake
customer_reviews.text: The shake came in great conditions and i like it
customer_reviews.author: Tonyusmc

customer_reviews.title: Hurrah!
customer_reviews.text: Now I don't have to go to Walmart to get this. YAY! This is the only flavor that I like of this product, and I can't get this at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Soonerman

customer_reviews.title: Easy breakfast or snack
customer_reviews.text: Glucerna has helped me have breakfast every day. This is important for a diabetic.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Must have for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: Must have for diabetics like myself. And strawberry is my favorite. Often hard to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: tommygemini

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Nice tasty snack that is a well balanced treat for someone who needs to watch carbohydrates intake. The carmel favor is my favorite, so far can only find it here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Glucerna for Diabetics
customer_reviews.text: bought the glucerna vanilla shakes for my elderly mother, I'm very glad I did. She is doing better and feeling a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Meek

customer_reviews.title: Great for diabetic people
customer_reviews.text: It has helped tremendously my parents. They love the taste and they feel a lot more energetic.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery & Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the fast delivery. I need this for my mom who has diabetes.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Taste terrible
customer_reviews.text: Taste was not good. And it is very expensive. Also didn't notice any benefit in controlling blood sugar levels.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Needing something as a meal replacement and tried these. They are pretty tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Price good
customer_reviews.text: For some else but no complains except it had soy init
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I started purchasing these for my mother, at the recommendation of her doctor. They are delicious and very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: IMMA

customer_reviews.title: thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: this is the best I was a pre diabetic and needed help for my diet and this drink and eating right help my sugar back to normal
customer_reviews.author: Mary Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good taste, though could use a bit more strawberry flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the Right Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product which has kept my blood sugar stable. I really like the taste of this particular flavor. I prefer this size to the larger size. It does a good job of filling me up without overdoing it.
customer_reviews.author: DavidCFL

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and good price for these drinks the strawberry flavor is my husband’s favorite. Even my grandkids drink for an afternoon snack.
customer_reviews.author: LCruz

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry Delight
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste and since I don't usually eat breakfast, the drink will hold me until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Verne

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good, I’ll be honest, as long a the price stays below $30.00, that is when I purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Glucerna variety pack
customer_reviews.text: Helps even out carb intake for Diabetics; two different flavors in pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product helps me keep my A1 C down it’s the lowest it’s ever been 5.8 of course I keep my other meals in check as well
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lynne Ready

customer_reviews.title: Easy to order
customer_reviews.text: Still expensive.. but my mom love the butter pecan flavor
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE MILLEN

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my Grandma, her diabetes is kicking ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Grandma, her diabetes is kicking her butt and these are the only things that she seems to be able to eat. Wish these were eligible for prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Live my glucerina
customer_reviews.text: I am a diabetic and this helps curve my appetite. It keeps me from any foof and drinks I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: sandra hadley

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is not the only thing good about this.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great meal on the go. Or if you find nothing sounds good to eat, and your a diabetic, you can drink this and get all of your nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: No Vanilla in Package
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 24 pack variety pack and sent to my father, and he told me he got no Homemade Vanilla. Was only Chocolate in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J

customer_reviews.title: Glucerna shakes help manage blood sugar levels.
customer_reviews.text: I love Glucerna shakes and the chocolate caramel flavor. I drink these shakes to help me manage my blood sugar levels.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Allen

customer_reviews.title: Refund not necessary
customer_reviews.text: My husband does not have much of an appetite due to his illness, but he does drink these protein shakes. Even though the order was slightly wrong, he will drink them, thus a refund is not necessary. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Products, when you need a healthy drink.  And you're watching your weight
customer_reviews.text: This is so delicious! And it's hard to believe, it's actually a health drink!?!
customer_reviews.author: Governor

customer_reviews.title: Helps with her daily nutritional intake.
customer_reviews.text: My mom hows 82years young uses this for her diabetic condition. She really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ATL

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like variety
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like variety I don’t like the vanilla and I can get it just at the same price at CVS on sale
customer_reviews.author: Jan fisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am a diabetic and take 290ml of insuline daily, plus 1000mg of metformin. This product helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: kent w irish

customer_reviews.title: ENJOY DRINKING
customer_reviews.text: I ENJOY DRINKING THIS PRODUCT FOR 1 MEAL THE FLAVOR IS SO DELIOUS. & THE PRODUCT FILLS U UP.
customer_reviews.author: DORIS C.

customer_reviews.title: Taste better than most
customer_reviews.text: I like this strawberry flavor. It is not overly sweet like some other shakes I have tried. The price of these on Amazon's auto shipment prrogram is fantastic compaared to anywhere else. As a type one diabetic, I drink these daily as my work schedule is quite unpredictable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Vita Cup has a wonderful taste and gives you energy as well as vitamins you need
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sugarfree Product
customer_reviews.text: I liked how the product was delivered so quickly. You had flavors that are not available in the store.It was easy for my sick sister to get and drink.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: This favor in my opinion is the best, but the chocolate is also delicious
customer_reviews.text: This favor in my opinion is the best, but the chocolate is also delicious. The chocolate reminds me of a liquid version of a "Fudgesicle". Yummy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lkj

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended it to me and it worked out great for my health. Will recommend it to anyone else that’s diabetic and has constant high blood sugar
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Was ok, but did not get variety pack as promised. Not for me
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Supplement with healthy benefits
customer_reviews.text: Tasty treat with added benefits when your hungry or feel your sugar levels dropping while you’re away from home.
customer_reviews.author: M Laporte

customer_reviews.title: I have been drinking this product for lunch for about ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking this product for lunch for about 5 years now. It helps with lowering my A1C blood count. I am diabetic. I have always had to go out to purchase this product. It has been difficult due to many health issues. It was a very pleasant surprise to find it here and I no longer have to go without it due to being stuck in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McDonald

customer_reviews.title: not what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: wanted a variety pack with all 5 flavors you have
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by doctor to boost protein and only this brand offers this flavor - use every morning with breakfast
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Strawberry meal shakes are generally not that great. However
customer_reviews.text: I admit I was not expecting these to be as tasty as they were. Strawberry meal shakes are generally not that great. However, these are actually pretty tasty and have become my go to morning drink. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: I. Blais

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting! You would never know it was for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting ! You would never know it was for diabetics.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia 11

customer_reviews.title: For my dieabites
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product so much I will be ordering again and I got it so fast it was unreal thank you
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor of them all
customer_reviews.text: Of all of the foods of this type, this one has the best flavor. If you have special diet needs it is nice to have a good "emergency" food on stand by. I like this one the best. My needs are more a low Carb food that travels well.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: Best taste! I'm really in love with the butter pecan! Great hunger buster for a meal or snack replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel L. Shensky

customer_reviews.title: tasty strawberry
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the strawberry favor. It was delicious. Will be trying a different favor in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: GingerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great if you a diabetic
customer_reviews.text: Great if you a diabetic, but they could make it little thicker like ensure, seems to be slightly watered down. But it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Sugar level increases
customer_reviews.text: Not ok for diabetic. After drinking it raises your blood sugar level.
customer_reviews.author: Nyenneh  A. Wisseh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are my favorite flavor and wonderful for a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The variety pack only came with chocolate and vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact that I only got two flavors in the variety pack. Wish I had gotten at least 4.
customer_reviews.author: Kareen

customer_reviews.title: best tasting protein shake
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like milkshake. None of that odd after taste that is typical of other protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Raghav Sharma

customer_reviews.title: It was important to know that it wouldn't raise my sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the convenience of grabbing one on the go and especially when I needed a pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Good for diabetic people
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Satisfies my sweet tooth without raising blood glucose level rapidly. Also works well as a meal replacement. Overall a very good product for diabetic people.
customer_reviews.author: eugenia richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good for all ... not just diabetic people
customer_reviews.text: It’s been working for my husband ( diabetic ) also my self..ohhh my Mom (73) have good nutrients...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too sweet unlike the other flavors
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mom who's diabetic. She loves the flavor. Not too sweet unlike the other flavors. So far, her glucose have been maintained at normal levels.
customer_reviews.author: skykrec

customer_reviews.title: A sports drink.
customer_reviews.text: Taste is good Goes great with liquor. It makes a great chaser. I drink a lot of G booze or no booze
customer_reviews.author: Gary Beadle'You..sub t

customer_reviews.title: like most of us
customer_reviews.text: I drink it because, like most of us , i need it. That said the product works to help stop the hunger cravings and taste pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a very dear friend who has suffered with diabetes for many, many years. The past six months he has suffered some bad set back with his health and has a hard time eating. I remembered Glucerna from when my mother's health was declining and I knew at least she would be getting some nutrition drinking these. For my friend, Glucerna has been a God send as he sometimes can't manage to eat solid food. Thank you for having these here and the price was good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Banta

customer_reviews.title: Want vanilla only
customer_reviews.text: Is it possible to get the vanilla flavor only. Allergic to chocolate. Does not like it mixed
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA Doldron

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy it, but, too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like GLucerna. I have 1 in the morning for breakfast and it holds me for the day. Unfortunately, the cost is too expensive. Much cheaper at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Adair

customer_reviews.title: The use of the product.
customer_reviews.text: Product was used for my newly-diagnosed diabetes. All flavors were excellent to the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine E Halbert

customer_reviews.title: Ideal protein snack
customer_reviews.text: Easy delivery for my elderly home bound sisters who enjoy Glucerna for snacks without worrying about blood sugar spikes
customer_reviews.author: Earthrn

customer_reviews.title: git for friend she loves them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for a friend who is diabetic and she loves the butter pecan flavor while one a day keeps her healthy
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: purchased these for the hubby and he absolutely LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good and. Fits my dietary needs. The automatic resenting that Amazon prime provides saves trips to the market which does not always have buster pecan, my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Zigman

customer_reviews.title: I love Glucerna as I don't eat correctly and my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Glucerna as I don't eat correctly and my husband is diabetic. I think I drink more than he does though.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Y.

product_meta.title: Glucerna, Diabetes Nutritional Shake, To Help Manage Blood Sugar, Rich Chocolate and Homemade Vanilla, Variety Pack, 8 fl oz (Pack of 24)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Variety PackGlucerna shakes are delicious grab-and-go meal or snack replacements designed for people managing their blood sugar. Glucerna Shakes have CARBSTEADY, unique blends of slow-release carbohydrates to help manage blood sugar,* as well as 10 grams of protein, 180 calories, and essential vitamins & minerals. They are suitable for lactose intolerance and are gluten-free. Glucerna is the #1 brand recommended by doctors for people with diabetes. *Designed to help minimize blood sugar spikes compared to high-glycemic carbohydrates.
feature_bullets: IMMUNE SYSTEM SUPPORT: With nutrients to help support immune system health, including protein, vitamins A & D, zinc, and antioxidants (vitamins C & E)
HELP MANAGE BLOOD SUGAR: Glucerna shakes have CARBSTEADY, unique blends of slow-release carbohydrates to help minimize blood sugar spikes. Great as a meal or snack replacement
DELICIOUS TASTE TO HELP CURB CRAVINGS: Making a smart choice can still be delicious with Glucerna shakes
LISTEN TO THE PROFESSIONALS: Glucerna is the #1 doctor-recommended brand for people with diabetes
RICH, DELICIOUS FLAVORS: Glucerna shakes come in 5 amazing flavors you’ll love. Rich Chocolate, Homemade Vanilla, Creamy Strawberry, Classic Butter Pecan, and Chocolate Caramel
Eligible to be purchased with Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits
In select stores;The SNAP (Supplemental Nutrition Assurance Program) name is a service mark of the U.S. Department of Agriculture;USDA does not endorse any goods, services, or enterprises

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
